commit.message: Don't document impossible to call default trait items on impls

files.patch:
@@ -0,0 +1,20 @@
+#![crate_name = "foo"]
+
+// Check that default trait items that are impossible to satisfy
+
+pub trait Foo {
+    fn needs_sized(&self)
+    where
+        Self: Sized,
+    {}
+
+    fn no_needs_sized(&self) {}
+}
+
+// @!has foo/struct.Bar.html '//*[@id="method.needs_sized"]//h4[@class="code-header"]' \
+// "fn needs_sized"
+// @has foo/struct.Bar.html '//*[@id="method.no_needs_sized"]//h4[@class="code-header"]' \
+// "fn no_needs_sized"
+pub struct Bar([u8]);
+
+impl Foo for Bar {}
